subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: McDonagh, a stalwart defenseman, had a breakthrough season during the club’s run to the Stanley Cup finals last spring and took over the captaincy in October, succeeding Ryan Callahan.
snippet: McDonagh, a stalwart defenseman, had a breakthrough season during the club’s run to the Stanley Cup finals last spring and took over the captaincy in October, succeeding Ryan Callahan.
